3. Documentation¶

stann.newRandomPoint(min_val, max_val)¶

Generates a random point with component values between min_val and max_val.

stann.createPointVector()¶

Generates an empty vector with dimension and data type matching the module configuration.

3.1. Algorithm Classes¶

class stann.bruteNN(pointVector, n)¶

Object for performing nearest neighbor calculations by brute force. The dimension and data type are determined by the dimension and data type of pointVector. Parameter n represents the number of points in pointVector.

ksearch(point, k, ans_vector)¶

Perform a nearest neighbor search on parameter point. Find the k nearest neighbors and store them inside ans_vector.

class stann.sfcnn(pointVector, n)¶

Similar to bruteNN but the nearest neighbor calculations are optimized.

ksearch(point, k, ans_vector)¶
class stann.sfcnn_knng(pointVector, n)¶

Similar to bruteNN but the nearest neighbor calculations are optimized and multi-threading is used.
